janamadhya ha thorathuru nawa amathiwaraya lesa diwurum dun keheliya rambaukwalla mahatha kanda udaratin bihiwu dewana janamadhya amathiwarayayi.meyata pera mahanuwarin ema thanathura usulanu labuwe diwangatha janadhipathi di. bi. wijethunga mahathaya. 1993 wasaredi prajathanthrawadi jathika peramuna (rajaliya) osse deshapalanayata piwisi rambaukwalla mahatha ema wasaredi madhyama palath sabha mathiwaranaya jayagena ehi manthriwarayaku lesa mulwarata theri path wiya.
ada api niyama mura sancharayakata bahinnayi yanne.

me athara, sajith premadasage pradhana mathiwarana meheyum katayuthu eksath jathika pakshaye hitapu mahalekamwarayaku wana thissa aththanayakata eeye (da9) pawaru bawata madhya magin kala prakashawala sathyathawak nomathi bawa eksath jathika pakshaya sandahan karayi.
